author: BenjaminRS
body:
#### PR description:

This PR removes obsolete code from the CaloLayer1 area which has been causing spurious elog warnings as described in [Issue#34309](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/34309). As suggested in this [comment to PR#35873](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/35873#issuecomment-954750836) I have removed the if else statement which was now obsolete.
title: Removing obsolete code
